P:E RATIO CALCULATOR

Calculate protein-to-energy ratio for any food

P:E RATIO

What is P:E Ratio?

P:E ratio measures grams of protein per 100 calories. A food with 30g protein and 200 calories has a P:E of 15 (extremely high). Higher P:E means more protein per calorie - ideal for muscle building while managing calories.

P:E RATIO TIERS

ELITE
≥2.5
Chicken breast, egg whites, Greek yogurt
EXCELLENT
2.0-2.49
Cottage cheese, tuna, protein bars
GOOD
1.5-1.99
Whole eggs, salmon, lean beef
MODERATE
<1.5
Nuts, cheese, regular bread

COMMON FOODS P:E REFERENCE

Food Protein Calories P:E Ratio Tier
Chicken Breast (100g)31g16518.8ELITE
Egg Whites (100g)11g5221.2ELITE
Greek Yogurt 0% (100g)10g5916.9ELITE
Cottage Cheese 1% (100g)11g7215.3ELITE
Whole Egg (50g)6g728.3ELITE
Salmon (100g)20g2089.6ELITE
Almonds (28g)6g1643.7EXCELLENT
Cheddar Cheese (28g)7g1136.2ELITE
